tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE farm_operations ( 
    farm_id INT, 
    farm_name VARCHAR(50), 
    renewable_energy_usage FLOAT, 
    waste_management_practices TEXT, 
    carbon_footprint_calculation DECIMAL(10,2) 
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management (
    farm_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    waste_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    waste_disposal_method VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    energy_source VARCHAR(255),
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management_practices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_type VARCHAR(255),
    waste_quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
    recycling_method VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE carbon_footprint_calculations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    total_carbon_emissions DECIMAL(10,2),
    calculation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE farm_operations (
    farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    farm_size DECIMAL(10,2),
    average_yield DECIMAL(10,2)
)
